title: Hello Kitty-tachi to Utaou! Kodomo no Uta Best Album: Yume no Hiyoko

synonyms: Sanrio Character to Utaou! Kodomo no Uta Best Album Yume no Hiyoko
alternative_titles.ja: ハローキティたちとうたおう！こどものうた　ベストアルバム　ゆめのヒヨコ

synopsis:
A series of music videos where you can sing hit songs such as "Yume no Hiyoko" and "Rattling Snakes" along with popular Sanrio characters such as Kitty.

(Source: VIDEO INSIDER JAPAN)
